text:
```muted-lead
Donor privileges are now live!
```
Hosting Place 2.0 is pretty costly for us, so any donation helps us ensure that Place 2.0 stays up and running.
While every donation is appreciated, users who donate 5.00 USD (American Dollars) or more will receive the following perks:
* The ability to place any colour you want
* A special donor badge for your profile (coming soon).

Click the **Donate** button in the navigation bar to learn more.
